Package co.uk.niadel.mpi.annotations

Classes to do with annotations.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    IAnnotationHandler
    All annotation handlers must implement this.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AnnotationHandlerRegistry
    Where you add annotations that are used by N-API MPIs or libraries to add Annotation functionality.
    MPIAnnotations
    Useful for mods with MPIs of their own but still mainly use N-API.
    VersionMarkingAnnotations
    Contains annotations to mark your methods to better organise it over versions.
  • Annotation Types Summary 
    Annotation Type Description
    MPIAnnotations.Dangerous
    Marks a method as being dangerous to use.
    MPIAnnotations.EventHandlerMethod
    Marks a method as a method that handles a method, specifically the one it has in it's parameters.
    MPIAnnotations.Internal
    Marks an annotation as being internal and not to use.
    MPIAnnotations.Library
    Marks a mod as being a library.
    MPIAnnotations.LoadStateMethod
    Allows for a mod method that's important to be called something other than the default preInit(), init(), and postInit().
    MPIAnnotations.ModRegister
    Somewhat analagous to Forge's @Mod annotation, only optional, and is just a shortcut rather than the fixed way of defining ModRegisters.
    MPIAnnotations.RecommendedMethod
    Marks a method as being the recommended method to use.
    MPIAnnotations.ShouldSuperInSubclasses
    Tells the user that they should super this method in subclasses.
    MPIAnnotations.Temprorary
    Marks a feature as not being permanent.
    MPIAnnotations.TODO
    Tells readers that you still want to add something.
    MPIAnnotations.UnstableLibrary
    Like @UnstableMod, but only for Libraries.
    MPIAnnotations.UnstableMod
    Marks a mod as being an unstable mod.
    VersionMarkingAnnotations.FirstStableRelease
    Records a feature's first appearance in a stable release version.
    VersionMarkingAnnotations.NotCompleted
    Marks a feature as being not finished.
    VersionMarkingAnnotations.NYI
    Marks a feature as not being added quite yet.
    VersionMarkingAnnotations.TestFeature
    Marks a feature as an test feature.
